I always say that we should respect religion and for them to give it back.
I want to give every major religious holiday maximum of 3 days of because in my primary school, we never got time given of for Eid or Ramadan. but for Christmas we get 2 weeks of even though it is 1 day and eid is 3 days and we get no day of but don't forget its not only for eid but for Hanukkah and Divali. we should get the same amount of days for every major celebration.
